channel.title: Client Crash Error
channel.description: [code]Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.getOutputStream(KKLI) at client.getByName(KKLI) at client.getHost(KKLI) at client.B(KKLI) at Applet_Sub1.run(KKLI) at client.run(KKLI) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code] does anyone know what this means it freezes client o.O

item.title: Client Crash Error
item.dc:creator: @Deathspirit Deathspirit
item.description:
@Deathspirit wrote:

It means you declared something wrongly in a class i guess.
